description:
###### 50% OFF  Version 1.2, Added backup feature, now you can send logs to your email and fixed the reports problem. #######

ABOUT
•	Tracking your weight points healps you and your doctor to control obesity and health releated issues.
•	The Weight Points Tracker simplifies weight points data logging.
•	This app will allow you to enter the multiple weight points at different times of a day.
•	 This app saves the Weight points, time of the measurement and note.
•	In addition to being a convenient data logger the software is also a voluble tool for weight points value longitudinal trends analysis using graphs.
•	 This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.
  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	Monitor the changes of weight points over time on the longitudinal graphs.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.
